resources.string: Section %1d is just a dummy section.
I will keep myself honest with my humor and be able to adapt to any situation.

string-array.name: vision_board_items
string-array.item: I will meditate for 10 mins before I start my workout
I will replace all my cleaners with natural ingredients like water and vinegar.
I will try to get more sleep, exercise outside sometimes and bingewatch netflix.
I will log what I eat to be more conscious of the food I am consuming.
I will do at least 5 stretches before and after I workout to warmup and cool down my body.
I will try to not be passive aggressive or sarcastic.
I will pay more attention to the feelings of my friends, family and my girlfriend.
Sometimes you have to lose your mind before you come to your senses.
